name: Abhishek Kumar
position: IIT Kharapur'24 | Ex-QR Intern @ JPMC | ADSYS | Data Analysis | Quant | Statistics | ML & DL
about: I am an avid programmer with a passion for learning and a focus on continuous skill improvement.  My experience spans software engineering and data analysis. Believing in the power of intellect and strong problem-solving, I seek opportunities in organizations using technology for societal betterment. From my role as a Market Risk Quantitative Researcher at JP Morgan to projects like the Perovskite Data Collection Model and the IBM zSystems Datathon, I possess a versatile skill set in AI, statistics, and data science. Leadership roles in organizing Kshitij showcase my effective collaboration in team environments. I am eager to contribute my skills to organizations aligned with my mission of making a positive impact through innovative technology solutions.
